alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 7:43PM CDT until April 19 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Southern Lincoln County in central Oklahoma... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 743 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles south of Wellston, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Northeastern Oklahoma City, Chandler, Jones, Luther, Davenport, Wellston, Carney, Sparks, Warwick, and Fallis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.
